metadata.name: Ep 1: The Ape Wakening, The Quest for the Diamond Fleece
metadata.description: It was just another tedious morning at the bored ape mountain retreat when the studious ape at the bar read the news about a sighting of the sacred diamond fleece in the old monkey woods.  He alerted his squad, they fuelled up on burgers and beer and set off on their boring adventure to find the true source of ape power and wisdom.
